name: DARK - STAR
description:
Dark Star is an epic arcade shoot-em-up in deepest, darkest space.

Pilot your spacecraft through waves of bad guys – barrel-rolling your way ever closer to huge scores and bigger explosions.

Inspired by classic arcade games from the 80’s and 90’s, Dark Star recaptures that same addictive gameplay but with graphics that finally live up to what those old box arts promised.

Features:
• Stunning 3D graphics (running at 60fps on new devices)
• All the brilliance and frustration of old-school arcade style challenges
• Unique one finger controls
• Upgradable and unlockable spaceships
• Shoot down enemy ships, clear space junk, dodge missiles and take on giant battle cruisers with a continually evolving mission structure
• Most importantly - Barrel Rolls!

Please note, this game features NO in-app purchases. Once you own Dark Star you’ll get all updates, fixes and new content for free, forever.

Want fancier graphics or a smoother frame rate? Check under the options menu for the graphics switch (in most cases the best graphics settings will be set automatically, we just included it as an option so you can tailor your own space experience to taste).

Questions, comments, queries or requests for things you would like to see in an update can be sent to us at darkstar@thatwonderfullemon.co

Plays best on an iPhone 5 / iPad Air or newer.
